ygData.subject: Re: Befallen
ygData.msgSnippet: It is part of a dark elf quest in which you get the Thex Mallet.  It involves several pieces and talking to some pretty tough mobs.   The Thex Maller
ygData.messageBody:
It is part of a dark elf quest in which you get the Thex Mallet.� It
involves several pieces and talking to some pretty tough mobs.

The Thex Maller actually is a pretty lousy weapon for what you have to kill.
